issue.title: All servers and all layers not taken into account
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

This is a big bug of the proxy.

I created a physical service on a secured geoserver wms
Then I created a virtual service based on this physical service.
After I created a policy and let the default rules on all servers.

This should allow to publish all layers of the service but none is shown on a GetCapabilities.

If I uncheck "all servers" and check "all layers", this is the same result

If I uncheck "all layers" and I specify specific layers, it works.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.1
